title: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
OB: When a working set with one project is created and selected, the package view is filtered. However, as soon as the working set is removed, changes are immediately applied.
EB: The package view should remain filtered until a different working set is selected or the filtering is manually reset.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a working set with one project and select it.
2. Observe that the package view is filtered.
3. Open the working set dialog again to create a second working set.
4. Delete the first working set and observe that the package view remains filtered even after its removal.
